scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --reset-cache --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.doctor: bash -lc 'node -v; npm -v; watchman --version 2>/dev/null || echo no-watchman; xcodebuild -version 2>/dev/null | head -n 1 || true'
scripts.ios:clean: cd ios && rm -rf build && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod install
scripts.restart: bash -lc 'lsof -ti :8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f "react-native|metro|node" 2>/dev/null || true; watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null || true; rm -rf /tmp/metro-*; npm run start -- --reset-cache'
scripts.restart:8082: bash -lc 'lsof -ti :8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null || true; npm run start -- --port 8082 --reset-cache'
